name: Untitled Platform Game (Boozbol)
description:
A demo version of a platform game that I created using some tutorials.

This is a very basic platform game that you would expect when you read the words "platform game". This is just a demo version and I uploaded this to search for bugs. If you find any, please tell me in the comment section. Thanks and enjoy the demo version!

[Be sure not to fall off the map! :D]
